biotools.summary: RBMR is a Mendelian randomization (MR) method to estimate the causal effect by accounting for the LD structure, systematic pleiotropy and idiosyncratic pleiotropy simultaneously in a unified framework.

bioschemas.name: RBMR
bioschemas.summary: RBMR is a Mendelian randomization (MR) method to estimate the causal effect by accounting for the LD structure, systematic pleiotropy and idiosyncratic pleiotropy simultaneously in a unified framework.
